gatekeeper_rules.description: URL must not be state .ny.gov (city .nyc.gov is OK)
gatekeeper_rules.name: no_state_nygov_url

gatekeeper_rules.description: Must have: URL, principal officer name, or officer contact URL
gatekeeper_rules.name: has_contact_info

nonprofit_exemptions: Mayor's Fund to Advance New York City

published_export_exceptions.name: Office of Digital Assets and Blockchain

type_specific_rules.description: Pension Fund: included if on allowlist (city employee funds)
type_specific_rules.name: pension_fund

type_specific_rules.description: Division: included if in Org Chart
type_specific_rules.name: division_in_org_chart

type_specific_rules.description: Public Benefit or Development Org: included if in Org Chart
type_specific_rules.name: public_benefit_in_org_chart

type_specific_rules.description: Nonprofit Organization: included if in Org Chart OR exemption
type_specific_rules.name: nonprofit_in_org_chart_or_exemption

type_specific_rules.description: Advisory/Regulatory Org: Org Chart, main nyc.gov URL, or exempt
type_specific_rules.name: advisory_in_org_chart_or_url_or_exemption
